short_summary: Formal arrangement for EFT processing and reporting
description: A formal arrangement with a single service provider for processing and reporting of incoming Electronic Fund Transfers (EFTs).
full_summary:
# Electronic Funds Transfer (EFT) Remittance Services

### Competition Overview

**Reference Number**: WS3866797366-Doc3866894285
**Amendment Number**: 3
**Solicitation Number**: WS3866797366

The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of the Receiver General for Canada, invites eligible contractors to participate in a competitive procurement process for the provision of Electronic Funds Transfer (EFT) remittance services.

### Request for Proposal (RFP)

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Procurement Category**: Service (SRV)
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

The contract period is expected to commence on July 4, 2023.

### Service Requirements

As the official agent of the Canadian government, the successful contractor will be responsible for processing and reporting on incoming EFTs. This initiative aims to streamline the receipt and management of these transactions.

### Submission Requirements

Please submit your proposal electronically and ensure that all required supporting documentation accompanies the bid submission. The submission deadline is:

* **Tender Closing Date**: April 6, 2023 at 14:00:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)

**Note:** Bids submitted after the expiration of the deadline will be considered non-responsive.

### Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PSPC)
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Name: Conner Higgins
	+ Title: (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: conner.higgins@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ Telephone: (Available upon request)

### Additional Information

Please find below the links for further information:

* This announcement can be accessed on [Canada Buys](https://www.canadabuys.gc.ca/procurement-data/contract-awards/eft-remittance-services).
* The EFT Remittance Services document can be accessed on [Ariba Discovery](https://community.ariba.com/CN-logon-eng).

### UNSPSC Codes

The contract falls under the following UNSPSC codes:

* 84120000: Banking and investment
* 84121500: Banking institutions

You have only 400 words to rework the text with the same information. Ensure your final output is readable, professionally formatted, and concise. You can find the UNSPSC codes at [UNSPSC
